Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 5/15/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1985, hitting .448 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1985, hitting .352 with 9 HR, 24 RBI...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,357,143 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles to Philadelphia on 2/8/1986 (Going to PHI: P Carlos Diaz, LF Mike Marshall, 2B Pete Stanicek. Going to LAD: SS Scott Fletcher, P Rocky Childress, P Mike Maddux)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Toronto on 7/20/1986 (Going to PHI: SS Dave Hansen. Going to TOR: LF Mike Marshall)...
Released by Toronto on 10/22/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/3/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1987, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1987...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/4/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $1,520,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/10/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 8/12/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 5/14/1990...
